pin aduwegana yanawa da manda?

paharagena gos ghathanaya kala bambalapitiya pradeshaye kotipathi wyaparikayaku wu mohomad siyam namaththa bhawitha kala jangama durakathanaya kolambaa kheththaramaye kunu alaka thibi hamuwuwada ehi simpatha methek hamuwi nomathi bawa polis aaranchimarga sandahan karayi.ghathanayata sambandha sakakaruwangen aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa kala prashna kirimwaladi anawaranaya wu thorathuruwalata anuwa siyam namaththage jangama durakathanaya pereda (23) kolambaa kheththaramaye kunu alaka thibi nawika hamuda kimidumkaruwan soyaganu labiya.ghathanayata lakwu siyamge mithuraku ema durakathanaya riyaduruta bharadi athi athara ohu ema durakathanaya kabali 3 kata kada mema kunu alata wisi kara athi bawata thorathuru anawaranaya wimen pasu mema jangama durakathanaya soya ganu labiya.

aandukrama wyawasthawe 4 i wyawasthawa mangin chanda balaya mangin janatha paramadhipathya kriyathmaka wima sambandhawa parlimenthu chandaya, janamatha wicharanaya, janadhipathiwaranaya sandahan wuwada palath sabha chandaya ho palath palana aayathana chandaya gana sandahan nowe. (1978 aandukrama wyawasthawa panawana awasthawa wana wita palath sabha wyuhayak nothibima ha palath sabha wyuhaya 1988 di sthapitha wima eyata hethu wannata atha.)
hudek winodaya, pi්rathiya, sathuta patha eewata adi yana minisun athin siduwana waradi boho ya.
ee sadaha nawa deshapalana prawanatha thula sakas kara gath widesha prathipaththiyak ratakata thibiya yuthuya.
boho piris thamange aagamika wishwasa wiwechanaya wima walakwa ganimata upakramashiliwa oya sankalpaya pawichchi karanawa.
eeka mata adala prashnayak neweyi.
